document_data.name: ''Spellchain''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spellchain''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[chainmail]] often worn by [[drow]] [[spellsword]]s.
document_data.Description: ''Spellchain'' was crafted out of an unusually light metal, making it flexible, allowing spellcasters to wear them without losing the ability to work the [[Art]].
document_data.Powers: These sets of armor possessed ''+4'' enchantment.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], these rare pieces of magic chain armor began appearing in locations within the dreaded [[Underdark]] and even reached the [[Moonsea]] region.
